page.title: 02Ecology LISVANE
page.content: MAIN TYPES {1.}Deciduous Woodland-mostly small woods _ Main trees Ash, Oak and Alder. Understory of bramble and honeysuckle. Ground flora includes Bluebell and Dogs Mercury. A rich habitat with a varied wildlife. {2.}Mature Plantation-main tree Larch-a poor habitat with ground flora confined to edges and paths. {3.}Agricultural Land{(i)}Improved pasture- species poor mainly rye grass and clover.{(ii)}Unimproved pastures- species rich includes Meadowsweet and Yellow Rattle. {(iii)}Rough pasture-mostly bracken dominated. {(iv)}Hedgerows-species rich-main components Hawthorn,Hazel,Holly,Field Maple.A good base flora. {4.}Residential-Gardens important for weed species,ponds and bird tables.
